    • Method Detail

      • setHistory

        public UpgradeTypes.UpgradeSpec.Builder setHistory(HistoryMigrationSpec history)
        Determines how vCenter history will be migrated during the upgrade process. vCenter history consists of:
        • Statistics
        • Events
        • Tasks
        By default only core data will be migrated. Use this spec to define which part of vCenter history data will be migrated and when. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null, only core database content will be migrated.
        Parameters:
        history - New value for the property.

      • setVcsaEmbedded

        public UpgradeTypes.UpgradeSpec.Builder setVcsaEmbedded(UpgradeTypes.VcsaEmbeddedSpec vcsaEmbedded)
        Information that are specific to this embedded vCenter Server. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null, ceip_enabled for embedded vcenter server upgrade will default to enabled.
        Parameters:
        vcsaEmbedded - New value for the property.

      • setPsc

        public UpgradeTypes.UpgradeSpec.Builder setPsc(UpgradeTypes.PscSpec psc)
        Information that are specific to this Platform Services Controller. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null, ceip_enabled for psc upgrade will default to enabled.
        Parameters:
        psc - New value for the property.

      • setAutoAnswer

        public UpgradeTypes.UpgradeSpec.Builder setAutoAnswer(java.lang.Boolean autoAnswer)
        Use the default option for any questions that may come up during appliance configuration. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null, will default to false.
        Parameters:
        autoAnswer - New value for the property.

        public UpgradeTypes.UpgradeSpec build()
